name: HyperlinkPageDestinations
shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink page destinations.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new hyperlink page destination.

parameter.name: destination
parameter.shortdesc: The document page that the hyperlink points to. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new HyperlinkPageDestination &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the HyperlinkPageDestination.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestinations within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageDestination, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkPageDestination, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageDestination, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkPageDestination, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the HyperlinkPageDestination that follows the desired HyperlinkPageDestination.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination whose index follows the specified HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The HyperlinkPageDestination whose index comes before the desired HyperlinkPageDestination.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every HyperlinkPageDestination in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyperlinkPageDestination.
Returns the HyperlinkPageDestination with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
